attributes.action: create a permanent borderforce to monitor entry into the UK to limit the chance of epidemics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A permanent border force based at Ports and Airports should be created not just illegal to catch immigrants but also to monitor and catch any possible epidemics. Recent cases such as bird flu or swine flu show the neccessity of keeping a border force on watch for epidemics and testing suspected cases.
